tool.name: 02a_raw_extract

param.name: polarity
param.label: Polarity
param.help: The polarity used for the mode of acquisition

tool.help:
================================== MTBLS Eco-Metabolomics workflow ==================================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | MTBLS RAW Extraction |
Description | Extract RAW mzML files |
----- Input -----
MTBLS study | Zipped MTBLS study |
Polarity | The polarity of the acquition mode, defaults to positive. Allowed values: positive or negative. |
------ Output ------
RAW mzML | Dataset collection of raw mzML files |
Study MAF peak table | Metabolights Assignment file |
Ecological characteristics | Ecological characteristics (traits) file in CSV format |
Phylogeny tree | Phylogenetic information file in TRE format |
Analytical metadata | ISA-Tab format Assay metadata file |
Sample metadata | ISA-Tab format Sample metadata file |
---------------------------------------------------
